Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54.server.model

Class ArtemisDecorator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54.server.model.GodDecorator
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54.server.model.ArtemisDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Player, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class ArtemisDecorator
extends GodDecorator
Class representing the Artemis God Card. From Santorini's rules: "Your Move: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space."
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • turnInit

      public Worker turnInit​(java.lang.Boolean male)
      Method used to initialize current player's turn. Sets current worker's moveToken to 2 and buildToken to 0.
      Specified by:
      turnInit in interface Player
      Overrides:
      turnInit in class GodDecorator
      Parameters:
      male - represent the sex of the worker which the player is going to use.
      Returns:
      the chosen worker with updated tokens.

    • setWorkerBoxesToMove

      public java.util.ArrayList<Box> setWorkerBoxesToMove​(Worker worker)
      Method used to set available boxes for the worker to move. Calls the super method and if the current worker's moveToken is 1 removes the initial position from the valid boxes.
      Specified by:
      setWorkerBoxesToMove in interface Player
      Overrides:
      setWorkerBoxesToMove in class GodDecorator
      Parameters:
      worker - current worker in use.
      Returns:
      the vector containing available boxes.

    • move

      public void move​(Worker worker, Box dest) throws InvalidMoveException
      Method used to perform a move action. Calls the super method and eventually notifies a message to the player in accordance to the tokens.
      Specified by:
      move in interface Player
      Overrides:
      move in class GodDecorator
      Parameters:
      worker - selected worker which the player wants to move.
      dest - selected destination box.
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if the move can't be done.

    • chose

      public void chose​(boolean choice)
      Method used to perform a binary choice. If choice is true restores a moveToken, otherwise set them to zero and sets the buildToken to 1.
      Specified by:
      chose in interface Player
      Overrides:
      chose in class GodDecorator
      Parameters:
      choice - the player's choice.
